name: ah
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express understanding, pleasure, pain, surprise, or the fact that you have noticed something: Ah, I see. Why has the train stopped? Ah, now we're off again. Ah, Jessica, how wonderful to see you! Ah, what a lovely baby!
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Linguistics: sounds used as interjections

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to show a sudden feeling, such as one of surprise, pleasure, or understanding: Ah, so that’s what the problem was!
